requestParams.name: account_type
requestParams.desc: 与帐户ID配合使用: 2=粉丝(原fansId),3:手机号,4:三方帐号(原open_user_id)

requestParams.name: end_date
requestParams.desc: 结束时间（以start_date开始7天内的某个时刻）例如2015-02-23 02:03:00

requestParams.name: start_date
requestParams.desc: 起始时间（30天内的某个时刻, 默认取最近7天内的记录）例如2015-02-03 02:03:00

children.name: total
children.desc: 操作之后的最新积分数值

children.name: expired_at
children.desc: 过期时间(秒级时间戳, 0: 永不过期)

children.name: third_biz_value
children.desc: 三方调用开放平台加/减积分接口传入的biz_value, 三方未传入则不会返回

';

';

token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['account_type']=1
params['account_id']="747291712"
params['start_date']="2018-12-11 00:00:00"
params['end_date']="2018-12-14 11:51:59"
params['page_size']=100

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.crm.customer.points.changelog.search', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

name: search
scenarios: 检索用户积分及积分变更记录
desc: 检索用户积分及积分变更记录
